message: Let's split it 50/50, fair and square!
I'll take the majority, but you'll still get a decent share!
I'm willing to give you a slight edge, but I'm not going to get taken advantage of!
I'll give you a slightly smaller edge, but I'm still trying to get the better deal!
I'm not getting any younger, Bob! I need a better deal to make it worth my while!
I'm not budging, Alice! You're going to have to do better than that!
